attributes.action: Scrap professional standing requirement for citizenship and passport application
attributes.additional_details:
The list of persons deemed of professional standing is published in:
https://www.gov.uk/countersigning-passport-applications/accepted-occupations-for-countersignatories
attributes.background: The Home Office requires passport and naturalisation applicants to have a 3+ year personal acquaintance of professional standing to act as a referee. This provision is antiquated, futile, discriminatory, absurd and a nuisance to both referee and referred. It's time to keep up with the times.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Edward Davey MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Kingston and Surbiton
